This transaction was executed in multiple trades at prices ranging from $104.8714 to $105; the price reported above reflects the weighted average sale price. The reporting person hereby undertakes to provide full information regarding the number of shares and prices at which the transactions were effected upon request to te SEC staff, the Registrant, or a security holder of the Registrant. The number of securities reported reflects the acquisition on July 31, 2016 of 46 shares of Apple Inc.'s common stock pursuant to the Apple Inc. Amended Employee Stock Purchase Plan ("ESPP") for the ESPP purchase period of February 1, 2016 through July 31, 2016.
